foundbug.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

catblock_disableforchromeandsafaristeptw.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions
catblock_disableforchromeandsafaristeptw.message: Uncheck the 'Enabled' checkbox next to every extension except for CatBlock. Leave CatBlock enabled.

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

whitelist_youtube_channel.description: Entry in the AdBlock menu, when a user is browsing YouTube and has enabled the YouTube channel whitelisting option

disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list
disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Izvinite, AdBlock je onesposobljen na ovoj strani zbog jedne od vaših lista filtera.

disableaa.description: Section header on the ad report page

nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list. 'Customize' should be the same text as the name of the 'Customize' tab.
nodefaultfilter1.message:
Mi nemamo standardnu listu filtera za taj jezik.
Molimo pokušajte da pronađete odgovarajuću listu koja podržava ovaj jezik $link$ ili blokirajte ovu reklamu sami u 'Modifikuj' tab-u.

checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

chrome.example: 'or Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

pagelanguagecheck.message: Na kom jeziku je stranica napisana?

catblock_show_on_adblock_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

malwarenotificationmessage.description: Notification when a malware request has been blocked. This message should be under 90 characters!
malwarenotificationmessage.message: AdBlock je blokirao preuzimanje sa web stranice koja je poznata da drži malver.

tabreloadcomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions
tabreloadcomplete.message: Gotovo! Ponovo smo pokrenuli stranicu sa reklamom. Molimo proverite da li je reklama nestala. Onda se vratite na ovu stranicu i odgovorite na pitanje ispod.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blockurlwithtext.message: Blokiraj URL-ove koji sadže ovaj tekst

you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.
you_can_slide_to_change.message: Možete da pomerite klizač ispod kako biste odredili tačno na kojim stranicama AdBlock neće raditi.

reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report
reportpubliclyavailable.message: Ne zaboravi: tvoj izveštaj može postati javno dostupan. Imaj to na umu pre uključivanja nečeg privatnog.

safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.
safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: Da biste sklonili dugme, desnim klikom na alatnu traku Safari-ja odaberite Customize toolbar (Prilogođivanje alatne trake), a zatim povucite dugme AdBlock iz alatne trake. Možete ga ponovo prikazati vraćanjem ga nazad u alatnoj traku.

reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer
reportfilterlistproblem.message: Ovo je problem liste filtera. Prijavi ga ovde: $link$

link.example: EXAMPLE 1: John Doe EXAMPLE 2: EasyList forums

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the Check-in-Firefox or Chrome step in the ad reporter
firefox_explanation.message: Svrha ovog pitanja je da se odredi ko bi trebao da primi vaš izveštaj. Ukoliko odgovorite na ovo pitanje pogrešno, izveštaj će biti poslat pogrešnim ljudima, pa može biti ignorisan.

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.
blacklistereditfilter.message: Molimo ukucajte pravilni filter ispod i pritisnite OK

adblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

checkinternetconnection.description: Displayed when AdBlock is checking the newest available version and an error occurs while reporting an ad on adreport page
checkinternetconnection.message: Da biste prijavili reklamu, morate biti povezani na internet.

framedomain.description: Resource list page: domain name of the frame

aamessageadreport.description: Acceptable Ads message on ad report page
aamessageadreport.message: Ako ne želite videti reklame poput ove, možete isključiti filter listu Prihvatljivih reklama.

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

catblock_adblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab

checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.
checkinfirefox_2.message: Instalirajte Adblock Plus za Firefox/$chrome$ ukoliko ga nemate.

chrome.example: 'or AdBlock for Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
debuginlogoption.message: Prikaži izjave uklanjanja greške u zapisu konzole (usporava AdBlock)

show_on_adblock_menu.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock popup menu should show the number of ads blocked
show_on_adblock_menu.message: Pokaži broj blokiranih reklama na AdBlock meniju

catblock_replaceadswithcats.description: Option on General tab used for enabling replacement of ads by pictures of cats
catblock_replaceadswithcats.message: Replace ads with pictures of cats

adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button, and that they can control the number badge that appears on the button.

headerfilter.description: Resource list page: title of a column

cleanuplist2.description: Option at the bottom of the 'Customize' options tab

malwarewarning.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing might be caused by malware/adware
malwarewarning.message: Vaš računar je možda zaražen sa malicioznim softverom. Kliknite ovde za više informacija.

filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab. 'Filter lists' should be the same text as the name of the 'Filter lists' tab.
filterlistsrock.message: Liste filtera blokiraju većinu reklama na internetu. Možete takođe:

catblock_update_available.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are updates available for CatBl
catblock_update_available.message:
There's an update for CatBlock! Go $here$ to update.
Note: If you want to receive updates automatically, just click on Safari > Preferences > Extensions > Updates
and check option 'Install updates automatically'.

filterannoyances.message: Fanboy's Annoyances (uklanja dosadne smetnje sa Weba)

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

yes.description: A positive response to a question

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is disabled on this page'

safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade
safari50_updatenotice.message: Koristite staru verziju Safarija. Nabavite najnoviju verziju da bi koristili dugme AdBlock-a na panelu sa alatkama da bi pauzirali AdBlock, omogućili prikaz reklama na određenim veb sajtovima, i kako bi prijavili reklame.

resourcedomain.description: Resource list page: text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

supportsite.description: Link to the support site on the Support tab of the options

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is paused

checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_4.message: U tom pretraživaču, učitajte stranu sa reklamom.

englishonly.description: Lets the user know that a link/page is available in English only

retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists
retryaftersubscribe.message: Prijavite se na ovu listu filtera, onda pokušajte ponovo: $list_title$

catblock_example_flickr_url.description: Second example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the $example$ alone. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

translator_credit.description: Will be followed by a list of translator names (separate string)

questionoridea.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

whatsnew.description: Link to display the changelog on the Support tab of the options
whatsnew.message: Šta je novo u poslednjem izdanju? Pogledajte spisak promena!

enableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've re-enabled extensions that were previously disabled
enableotherextensionscomplete.message: Dodaci koji su pre bili onemogućeni sada su omogućeni.

filterantisocial.message: Antisocijalna lista filtera (uklanja dugmad društevnih mreža)

work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.
work_around_hulu_problems.message: Zaobiđite videe sa Hulu.com koji ne rade (zahteva restartovanje pretraživača)

catblock_add_photos.description: Shown on the CatBlock tab of the options page. Users click this button to add a new list of images.

betalabel.description: Label for beta features in AdBlock Options

filterczech.description: Language names for a filter list

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist a page

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

dropboxerrorforfilters.description: Message to Dropbox sync users on the Customize tab, custom filters / disabled.
dropboxerrorforfilters.message: Premašili ste Dropbox ograničenje veličine. Molimo uklonite neke unose iz vaših prilagođenih ili onemogućenih filtera pa pokušajte ponovo.

orchrome.description: Used for placeholder in checkinfirefoxtitle and checkinfirefox_1 strings

allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.message: Dopusti postavljanje specifičnih YouTube kanala na listu dopuštenih

adstillappear.message: Da li je reklama i dalje vidljiva?

here.description: This message is injected in other strings as a link/button

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

adblock_outdated_chrome.description: Ad report page instructions to update AdBlock in Chrome. The link will point to 'chrome://chrome/extensions/'
adblock_outdated_chrome.message: Koristite staru verziju AdBlock-a. Molimo idite do strane za prijključke, uključite 'Režim razvojnika' i kliknite na 'Ažuriraj priključke sada'

catblock_excludedomainorurl.message: The domain or url where CatBlock shouldn't block anything

catblock_add_more_photos.description: Introduction to the examples of custom image lists. Leave the and as they are.
catblock_add_more_photos.message: Add some photos from Flickr! You can enter:

catblock_enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'CatBlock is disabled on this page'

disableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions
disableotherextensionscomplete.message: Onemogućili smo sva proširenja. Sada ćemo ponovno pokrenuti stranicu sa reklamom. Sekundu, molim.

showlinkstolists2.description: Option on the 'Filter lists' tab of the Options page

catblock_whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

customfilters.description: List for custom filters the user subscribed to

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue
clickthead.message: Pritisnite na reklamu, i ja ću vam objasniti kako da je blokirate.

disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted
disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock je onesposobljen na ovoj strani.

tabsupport.description: A tab on the options page

close.description: Generic message for buttons that close a view or window

datacollectionoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
datacollectionoption.message: Dopusti AdBlock-u anonimno prikupljanje podatka i korišćenja liste filtera

update_available.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are updates available for AdBlock
update_available.message:
Postoji nova verzija AdBlock-a! Idite $here$ kako biste je preuzeli.
Ako želite preuzimati ažuriranja automatski, samo kliknite u Safari > Postavke > Ekstenzije > Ažuriranja
i označite opciju 'Instaliraj ažuriranja automatski'.

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog

catblock_options.description: Title of the CatBlock options page tab

blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found
blacklistersinglematch.message: To odgovara jednoj stavci na ovoj strani.

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that gets you to the Options page for an extension

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

sourcecode.description: Link to the source code of AdBlock on the Support tab of the options

block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

selectlanguage.description: Text for the first option in Langage Dropdown for Filter Lists tab in options. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.

manuallyenableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that they will need to manually reenable the extensions
manuallyenableotherextensions.message: Otvori stranicu dodataka kako bi omogućili dodatke koji su bili onemogućeni.

catblock_show_on_adblock_menu.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the CatBlock popup menu should show the number of ads blocked
catblock_show_on_adblock_menu.message: Show number of ads blocked on CatBlock menu

loading.description: Generic message displayed during processes that take some time

excludedomainorurl.message: Domen ili url gde AdBlock ne treba da blokira bilo sta

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Isključite 'Omogućeno' polje za potvrdu pored svakog priključka osim AdBlock-a. Ostavite da AdBlock bude uključen.

description2.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.
description2.message: Najpopularniji dodatak za Chrome, sa preko 40 miliona korisnika! Blokira reklame na celom internetu.

filterorigin.description: Resource list page: tooltip of matching filter, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

catblock_status_disabled.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that disallow extensions, such as the Extensions Gallery or about:blank
catblock_status_disabled.message: CatBlock can not run on this domain.

linkunblock.message: Prikazuje reklame na veb strani ili domenu

thirdparty.description: Resource list page: column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves
fixityourself.message: OK, i dalje možete da blokirate ovu reklamu za sebe na strani sa podešavanjima. Hvala!

contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab of the options
contributors.message: Takođe, imamo i stranicu o ljudima koji su napravili AdBlock!

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Ako želite da sakrijte dugme, kliknite na njega desnim klikom i izaberite Sakrij Dugme. Možete ga prikazati opet pod chrome://chrome/extensions.

catblock_malwarenotificationcheckboxmess.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the Malware filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page
catblock_malwarenotificationcheckboxmess.message: Should CatBlock notify you when it detects malware?

catblock_safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade
catblock_safari50_updatenotice.message: You are using an old version of Safari. Get the latest version in order to use the CatBlock toolbar button to pause CatBlock, whitelist websites, and report ads. Upgrade now.

whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options
whatmakesadblocktick.message: Želite da vidite kako radi AdBlock?

filterlistlink.message: Nemojte se prijavljivati na više nego vam je potrebno -- svaki filter dodatno usporava AdBlock! Zasluge i druge liste možete pronaći ovde.

filtersavewarning.message:
Budite pažljivi: ukoliko napravite grešku ovde mnogo drugih filtera, uključujući i oficijalne filtere, mogu da prestanu da rade kako treba!
Pročitajte sintaksni vodič za filtere kako bi naučili da dodajete napredne filtere zabranjujućih i dopuštajućih lista.

blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked
blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Pazite: ovaj filter blokira sve $elementtype$ elemente na strani!

clickdisableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, an alternative way to disable other extensions
clickdisableotherextensions.message: ILI, samo kliknite ovo dugme kako bi uradili sve ovo iznad: Onemogući sve druge dodatke

checkforupdates.description: Displayed when AdBlock is checking the newest available version
checkforupdates.message: Proveravanje ažuriranja (trebalo bi trajati samo par sekundi)...

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

headertype.description: Resource list page: title of a column

undo_last_block.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard
undo_last_block.message: Vrati moja blokiranja na ovom domenu

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

aalinkadreport.description: Acceptable Ads link message on ad report page
aalinkadreport.message: Naučite više o programu Prihvatljivih reklama.

catblock_disableallextensions.message: Disable all extensions except for CatBlock.

catblock_disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list
catblock_disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Sorry, CatBlock is disabled on this page by one of your filter lists.

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

malwarecheck.description: Section header on the ad report page
malwarecheck.message: Proveri za malver koji možda ubacuje reklame:

catblock_you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.
catblock_you_can_slide_to_change.message: You can slide below to change exactly what pages CatBlock won't run on.

malwarenotificationlearnmore.description: Button on the malware notification that opens a page about malware on our website. Message should be under 45 characters!

catblock_status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when CatBlock is paused

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Što više filter lista koristite, to je AdBlock sporiji. Korišćenje previše lista mogu čak da blokiraju vaš pretraživač na nekim veb sajtovima. Kliknite OK da koristite ovu listu svejedno.

catblock_you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
catblock_you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: The more filter lists you use, the slower CatBlock runs. Using too many lists can even crash your browser on some websites. Press OK to subscribe to this list anyway.

no.description: A negative response to a question

catblock_unpause_adblock.description: Link text to unpause CatBlock, displayed immediately after 'CatBlock is paused'

storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser
storage_quota_exceeded.message: Prekoračili ste nivo skladištenja kori AdBlock može da koristi. Molimo obustavite praćenje nekih lista filtera!

catblock_latest_version.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are no updates available for CatBlock

blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab
blacklistclickmessage.message: Kliknite desnim klikom na reklamu da je blokirate -- ili je blokirajte ovde ručno.

malwarenotfound.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing are probably not caused by malware/adware
malwarenotfound.message: Nije pronađen nijedan poznati maliciozni softver.

checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_5.message: Da li se reklama takođe pojavljuje u tom pretraživaču?

debuginfo.description: Users can click this link to provide debug information to AdBlock staff
debuginfo.message: Da li je naš tim zatražio dodatne informacije o bagu? Kliknite ovde za to!

unpause_adblock.description: Link text to unpause AdBlock, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused'

advanced_options2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
advanced_options2.message: Ja sam napredni korisnik, pokaži mi dodatne opcije

catblock_example_flickr_id.description: Second example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the $example$ alone. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

blacklisteroptions1.message: Šta mislite da će biti tačno što se tiče ove reklame svaki put kad posetite stranicu?

noresourcessend2.message: Nešto se pokvarilo. Resursi nisu poslati. Stranica će se sada zatvoriti. Pokušajte ponovno pokrenuti vebsajt.

checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_3.message: U tom pregledaču, pretplatite se na iste liste filtera koje imate na ovom.

blacklisterthefilter.message: Filter, koji se može promeni na strani sa podešavanjima:

frametype.description: Resource list page: followed by frame type (e.g. top frame, subframe)

frameurl.description: Resource list page: full URL of the frame

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Nemoj pokretati na stranama ovog domena

blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found
blacklistermatches.message: Ima $matchcount$ takve stavke na ovoj strani.

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

catblock_example_flickr_search.description: First example of a custom image list that a user can add. Leave the and as they are. e.g. is shorthand for "for example".

warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a blacklisting filter
warning_overrules_filters.message:
Upozorenje: na svim ostalim sajtovima ćete videti reklame!
Ovo poništava sve ostale filtere za te sajtove.

catblock_whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options
catblock_whatmakesadblocktick.message: Want to see what makes CatBlock tick?

catblock_check_checkbox.description: Shown on the CatBlock tab on the options page. Don't translate the word CatBlock.
catblock_check_checkbox.message: Check the checkbox by the sets of pictures that you want to use.

catblock_contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab of the options
catblock_contributors.message: We've got a page to help you find out about the people behind CatBlock, as well!

adblockinglist.description: List for subscribed ad blocking fiters

catblock_storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser
catblock_storage_quota_exceeded.message: You exceeded the amount of storage CatBlock can use. Please unsubscribe from some filter lists!

correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters
correctfilters.message: Proverite da li koristite ispravni filter za jezik:

blockdomain.message: Domen strane na kojoj se primenjuje

adreportvoluntary.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page
adreportvoluntary.message: Prijavljivanje reklama je dobrovoljno. Pomaže drugima da takođe ne vide reklame tako što održavatelji lista filtera blokiraju reklamu za sve. Ako se ne osećate altruistički, to je isto u redu. Zatvorite ovu stranicu i blokirajte reklamu samo sebi.

cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question
cantblockflashwarning.message: Da li se ova reklama vidi u filmu ili ispred filma ili nekog drugog priključka poput igre u Flash-u?

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Blokiraj samo reklame na ovim sajtovima:

invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

blocked_ads.description: Title for popup menu section showing number of ads blocked

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

operabutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Opera displays on the Extensions page.
operabutton_how_to_hide2.message: Da sklonite dugme, idite na opera://extensions i obeležite opciju 'Ukloni sa alatne trake'. Možete ga vratiti kasnije tako što poništite tu opciju.

headerresource.description: Resource list page: title of a column

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

adreportintro.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page
adreportintro.message: Pronašli ste reklamu na web-stranici? Pomoći ćemo Vam da pronađete pravo mesto da je prijavite!

reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to reenable the extensions one by one
reenableadsonebyone.message: Odlično! Pronađimo sada koje proširenje je uzrok. Prođite kroz listu i omogućite svako proširenje posebno. Proširenje koje ubacuje reklame je ono koje bi trebali ukloniti da bi se rešili reklama.

subscribeconfirm.description: Prompt question before subscribing to the filter list
subscribeconfirm.message: Da li ste sigurni da se želite pretplatiti na spisak filtera $title$?

confirm_undo_custom_filters.description: Confirmation message when user wants to undo their custom blocks for a domain. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999, $host$ will be the domain where the custom blocks will be reset.
confirm_undo_custom_filters.message: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti $count$ blokiranja koje ste napravili na $host$?

count.example: The number of custom blocks for a domain.

legend.description: Resource list page: followed by color codes for various resource statuses (e.g. blocked, whitelisted, hidden)

show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for blacklisting section of Customize tab
show_ads_except_for.message: Prikaži reklame svuda osim na ovim domenima...

updatenowmessage2.message: Ažuriranja će se preuzimati automatski; takođe možete ažurirati sada

somethingwentwrong.description: Displayed when AdBlock is checking the newest available version and an error occurs
somethingwentwrong.message: Desila se nekakva greška kod provere ažuriranja.

updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page
updateyourlists.message: Proverite da li su svi filteri ažurni:

show_resourcelist.description: Menu entry to open the resource list page

findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads
findingads.message:
Pronalaženje reklama...

Ovo će potrajati samo malo.

latest_version.description: On the Options > Support page, shows when there are no updates available for AdBlock

report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Poslednji korak: Sta čini ovo reklamom?

show_on_adblock_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked
show_on_adblock_button.message: Pokaži broj blokiranih reklama na AdBlock dugmetu

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

chrome.example: 'or Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question
cantblockflash.message: Ne možemo još da blokiramo reklame unutar Flash-a i ostalih priključaka. Čekamo podršku pretraživača i WebKit-a.

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

disableforsafaristepone.message: Kliknite na Safari meni → Podešavanja → Extenzije.

oradblockforchrome.description: Used for placeholder in checkinfirefox_2 string

sliderexplanation.message: Pomerite klizač dok je reklama ispravno blokirana na stranici, i blokirani element izgleda korisno.

malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the Malware filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page
malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.message: Da li AdBlock treba da Vas obavesti kada pronađe maliciozni softver?

ad_report_please.description: Link to the ad report page on our support site. This is found on the Support tab of the options.
ad_report_please.message: Ako vidite reklamu, nemojte napraviti prijavu baga, napravite prijavu reklame!

catblock_disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted
catblock_disabled_on_this_page.message: CatBlock is disabled on this page.

catblock_debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
catblock_debuginlogoption.message: Show debug statements in Console Log (which slows down CatBlock)

customfilterserrormessage.description: Error message when there is an issue with a custom filter on the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

otherfilters.description: List for other filters the user subscribed to

malwarenotificationdisablethesemessages.description: Button on the malware notification to disable future notifications. Message should be under 45 characters!

wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Message (alert) shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website
wizardcantrunonframesets.message: Ova AdBlock mogućnost ne radi na ovoj stranici jer koristi zastarelu tehnologiju. Možete staviti resorse na listu zabranjujućih i dopuštajućih filtera ručno u kartici 'Prilagodi' u podešavanjima.

adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do

showcontextmenus2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
showcontextmenus2.message: Dodaj stavke na meni desnog klika

disableyoutubestreamingads.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. Allow AdBlock and the ClickToFlash Safari extension to work simultaneously on YouTube.

pwyw.description: Text of a payment request link

catblock_wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Message (alert) shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website
catblock_wizardcantrunonframesets.message: This feature does not work on this site because it uses out of date technology. You can blacklist or whitelist resources manually in the 'Customize' tab of the options page.
